Namespace Sustenet.Transport

Classes

BaseClient

The core for all clients. Handles basic functionality like sending and receiving data. Also handles the core for connecting to servers.

BaseClient.TcpHandler

Handles events for connecting, receiving, and debugging. Also controls the socket connection.
